S.FORM: Eric Anderson ( , NBA ) Eric Anderson ( , NBA ) Eric Anderson nalecuhan i Chicago, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. 5 bulad 26 demiad, 1970 a mihca, Eric Anderson, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
